alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Androscoggin and north central Cumberland Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raymond, or 7 miles east of Naples, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gray, Raymond, Casco, New Gloucester, Poland and Otisfield. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 68 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford
